data.text: @ChristyL17 @HelloDollyBway @BetteMidler Yup and my son reached out his hand and Bette Midler stepped back to shake it!

@willowgreen1 @HelloDollyBway @BetteMidler You must have been sitting right behind me! I was front row center last Saturday night. Seeing it again tonight, my 10th time and will be 7th time front row. I'll be back for the last two shows Aug. 25th. Bette is my hero. ❤

@ChristyL17 @HelloDollyBway @BetteMidler Saw this joyous production last Saturday night (2nd row center) for the 7th time and will see it again on Aug 24th! We’ve been in the front row center 2 out of the 7 and more special to last a lifetime!
@ChristyL17 @HelloDollyBway @BetteMidler I love #HelloDolly! Could go to the show every night if I was able. #BetteMidler is the best Dolly!
